headline: Computerworld Names Zebra Technologies to 2026 List of Best Places to Work in IT
summary: LINCOLNSHIRE, Ill., January 20, 2026--Zebra Technologies Corporation (NASDAQ: ZBRA), a global leader in digitizing and automating workflows to deliver intelligent operations, today announced it has been named to the Computerworld 2026 list of Best Places to Work in IT. Zebra ranked #37 among large organizations, marking a significant advancement from its #51 position last year.
